downloadTitle: Live Communications Server 2005 Document: Updating to Service Pack 1 and Enabling Public IM Connectivity
downloadDescription: This document guides you through the process of updating from Microsoft Office Live Communications Server 2005 to Microsoft Office Live Communications Server 2005 with Service Pack 1.
detailsSection: This document guides you through the process of updating from Live Communications Server 2005 to Live Communications Server 2005 with Service Pack 1 (SP1). It provides step-by-step instructions for updating each server role and explains what’s new in SP1.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office application:
    • Microsoft Office Live Communication Server 2005
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. Double-click the LCS_2005_Update_Sp1.exe program file on your hard disk to start the Setup program.
  3. Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation.
Instructions for use:

After you install this download, open the document as you typically would.

To remove this download:

To remove the download file, delete the file LCS_2005_Update_Sp1.exe.

To remove the document, delete it from the folder where it was saved.

relatedResourcesSection.title: live Communications Server 2005 on Office Online
